interface.name: org.freedesktop.Secret.Collection
interface.tp:docstring: A collection of items containing secrets.

property.name: Label
property.tp:docstring: The displayable label of this collection.

property.name: Locked
property.tp:docstring: Whether the collection is locked and must be authenticated by the client application.

property.name: Created
property.tp:docstring: The unix time when the collection was created.

property.name: Modified
property.tp:docstring: The unix time when the collection was last modified.

arg.name: prompt
arg.tp:docstring: A prompt to delete the collection, or the special value '/' when no prompt is necessary.

method.name: SearchItems
method.tp:docstring: Search for items in this collection matching the lookup attributes.

method.name: CreateItem
method.tp:docstring: Create an item with the given attributes, secret and label. If replace is set, then it replaces an item already present with the same values for the attributes.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: The properties for the new item.

arg.name: secret
arg.tp:docstring: The secret to store in the item, encoded with the included session.

arg.name: replace
arg.tp:docstring: Whether to replace an item with the same attributes or not.

arg.name: item
arg.tp:docstring: The item created, or the special value '/' if a prompt is necessary.

arg.name: prompt
arg.tp:docstring: A prompt object, or the special value '/' if no prompt is necessary.

arg.name: prompt
arg.tp:docstring: A prompt object, used to show the change password dialog on the screen.

signal.name: ItemCreated
signal.tp:docstring: A new item in this collection was created.

signal.name: ItemDeleted
signal.tp:docstring: An item in this collection was deleted.

signal.name: ItemChanged
signal.tp:docstring: An item in this collection changed.
